analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x1f0480a66883de97d2b054929252aae8f664c15c.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.22 (/unique_contracts/0x1f0480a66883de97d2b054929252aae8f664c15c.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of NePay.balanceOf (/unique_contracts/0x1f0480a66883de97d2b054929252aae8f664c15c.sol#157) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of NePay.transfer (/unique_contracts/0x1f0480a66883de97d2b054929252aae8f664c15c.sol#163) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_amount' of NePay.transfer (/unique_contracts/0x1f0480a66883de97d2b054929252aae8f664c15c.sol#164-165) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_owner' of NePay.allowance (/unique_contracts/0x1f0480a66883de97d2b054929252aae8f664c15c.sol#194) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of NePay.allowance (/unique_contracts/0x1f0480a66883de97d2b054929252aae8f664c15c.sol#194-195) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_from' of NePay.transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0x1f0480a66883de97d2b054929252aae8f664c15c.sol#173-174) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of NePay.transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0x1f0480a66883de97d2b054929252aae8f664c15c.sol#174) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_amount' of NePay.transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0x1f0480a66883de97d2b054929252aae8f664c15c.sol#174) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of NePay.approve (/unique_contracts/0x1f0480a66883de97d2b054929252aae8f664c15c.sol#185-186) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of NePay.approve (/unique_contracts/0x1f0480a66883de97d2b054929252aae8f664c15c.sol#186) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of NePay.distr (/unique_contracts/0x1f0480a66883de97d2b054929252aae8f664c15c.sol#113-114) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_amount' of NePay.distr (/unique_contracts/0x1f0480a66883de97d2b054929252aae8f664c15c.sol#114) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of NePay.burn (/unique_contracts/0x1f0480a66883de97d2b054929252aae8f664c15c.sol#210) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_tokenContract' of NePay.withdrawForeignTokens (/unique_contracts/0x1f0480a66883de97d2b054929252aae8f664c15c.sol#218-220) is not in mixedCase
